body.name: COLAMY Office Chair with Footrest-Ergonomic High Back Design Executive Computer Desk Chair with Removable Lumbar Pillow, 90-135°Reclining, Thick Bonded Leather for Home Office Work Comfort, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 4 mins
features: 👍【Bonded Leather for Comfort】Not all artificial leather is created equally. This executive desk chair is upholstered in bonded leather, providing luxurious feel. It is resistant to scratches, stains, peeling, and cracking. With padded linkage armrests and an elegant design look, this boss chair will complement your home or office perfectly.

👍【Perfect Ergonomic Design】Our ergonomic office chair is double padded all around, with high backrest, widened sides and removable lumbar support pillow, all these for offering excellent support by wrapping your whole body, allowing you to sit for long periods of time without any discomfort. Also, the retractable footrest can support your legs when napping.

👍【Certified Seating Experience】Each part was carefully selected and finished to perfection. This computer chair comes with extra thick and large cushion(21W" X 18.7D", 5.51" Thick) that will greatly enhance your sitting experience, no more pain or fatigue during long hours of gaming or working.

👍【Upgraded and Fully Adjustable】This newly upgraded office chair with eye-catching outlook is an excellent choice for working-from-home chair. Seat height can be adjusted between 19.69"-22.83". Pull the lever to enjoy rocking from 90°-135°. It also equipped with a convenient footrest. With this office chair you can get the most comfortable sitting experience under different conditions. Also, with its heavy duty metal base, this desk chair can support up to 300 LBs.

👍【Additional Lumbar Support Pillow】Our desk chair is equipped with a removable lumbar support pillow, which will provide you with effective support for your lower back. You can relax your back muscles and increase blood circulation while working and immersing yourself in study and gaming in front of your desk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COLAMY Office Chair with Footrest ——————Dedicated to planting roots in your dream land.

Details Adjustable Headrest Fully support your neck and head, no matter how tall you are. Retractable Footrest You can use it to support your legs when napping. Reclining Function Pull the lever to enjoy reclining from 90°-135° 5.5" Thickness The extra thickened cushion is equipped with high-density foam, providing you with a first-class sitting experience

Lumbar Support Pillow Providing additional support for your back. Make you feel comfortable even after long time working. Ergonomic Back Design Perfect ergonomic design, supporting your whole body more scientifically. Linkage Armrests With padded linkage armrests and an elegant design look, this boss chair will complement your home or office perfectly. Heavy Duty Metal Base Supports up to 300 LBs. 360° smooth-rolling casters can be silent and solid when moving.
High Back Executive Computer Desk Chair How to Assemble ? The office chair is easy to assemble, just according the manual instruction, not difficult for anyone to put together!!!

La chaise est tres confortable et le rassemblement de parties n'est pas dificille. Elle semble etre tres resitante.

reviews.reviewTitle: If I could give this chair 10 stars I would!
reviews.reviewText: I've sat in quite a few office chairs in my day. It's always difficult to find one that has the right amount of support with the right amount of comfort, and being able to lean back and relax for a bit is always a balancing act.Once we set up this office chair and gave it a test run, we were tempted to sleep in it! The cushion in the back and seat is so perfectly padded. It's not too firm and not too soft. I feel like the Three bears leaving this review, but it really is just right! I love that it comes with a lumbar support cushion. I throw that in behind me when I need a little extra support, but I find that I'm regularly leaving it on my lap and sort of cuddling it while I'm sitting at the desk.I don't think I've ever had an office chair that has a pull out foot rest! This feature is by far one of my favorites. It impresses anybody that sees it, and when it comes to being able to sit back and relax, it adds that extra layer of comfort you didn't realize you wanted until you have it.The chair itself was very easy to assemble. The pieces fit snugly together and there's no wiggle to any of the assembled areas. The material is very high quality, the stitching is extremely well done and I see this office chair lasting years. I highly recommend this for anybody looking for ergonomic support, Elegance and comfort!

reviews.reviewTitle: Soft and comfortable; would be perfect if a bit more adjustments available
reviews.reviewText: I already have a nice chair for my basement office but I have adult family members and friends visiting me in the office and looking and discussing items on the screens, and I had no place for them to sit for any length of time (just a lightweight bench)…so I really could use a second office chair.It really needed to be solid because I am 6 feet and 250 pounds, and some visitors are a little taller and a little bit heavier.The chair assembly was pretty straightforward, although the instructions were packaged with the chair seat or back instead of at the top of the shipping carton so I ended up googling and finding some instructions that guided me with the wheel assembly…and then I found the instructions for this specific chair.It would have been easier at a couple of points if I had an assistant (e.g., lining up holes and holding things while I inserted and tightened bolts), but I did manage to put it all together myself.In the end, I am pretty pleased with the chair. It is soft and comfortable and I am happy sitting on it while I work for hours and hours.My only observations, beyond the locating of the instructions as mentioned earlier, are:1. I find it very difficult to pull out the footrest using the material strap (it is much easier for me to reach down and hook a finger/thumb around the front corner of the metal bar and use that instead)2. It would be nice if the lumbar pillow had something like a Velcro strap that could be used to strap it in place (maybe a strap that can be run around the back and then the ends Velcro together) so it doesn’t shift/slide3. I wish there was another adjustment: one that tilts the seat itself and then can be locked in place. The way it is now, especially when using the footrest, it seems to have a slight tilt forward so it feels like I might slide forward on the seat (I haven’t yet, but it just gives me that feeling). I am more comfortable on a chair with an adjustment that lets me tilt the seat bottom back a bit so i feel like I am more securely in the chair. Keep in mind that the seat back can be leaned back and locked in place; I am talking about the seat bottom where my posterior lands when I sit down.To summarize, apart the feeling that my butt might slide forward, which may not be an issue for others but I, and another person who tried the chair said with out prompting, definitely felt, the chair is comfortable for long days working. The footrest is not something I have found myself wanting to use while working at my desk, but when relaxing and surfing the net, etc., it is a really nice feature.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great and very comfortable office chair I’ve ever had
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best office chairs I’ve ever had so far. Its surface is upholstered in bonded leather, providing luxurious feel. It is padded all around making it very comfortable sitting on it. The installation is easy and straightforward as per the instructions. It moves very well in any directions. The ergonomic design provides good support to your lumbar and back, especially there is an extra removable support pillow for lower back. The height adjustment function works very smoothly. The reclining office chair can change the angle of the seat back so you can completely relax on it. One of my favourite parts is the footrest. It adds extra comfort and is good for taking a nap. In addition, the headrest is also adjustable to adapt to people with different heights. Overall, if the price is acceptable to you, it would be one of the best choices for you.
